name: opt
description: Opt out or in from the bot tracking and assigning active roles to you

options.name: in
options.description: Allow the bot to start tracking your activity and assign you active roles

options.name: out
options.description: Stop the bot from tracking you and assigning you active roles, all active roles will be removed

options.name: status
options.description: See if you are opted in/or of activity tracking
